channel.title: Serenex Reborn | New 317 Server | Needing Staff&Players | 24/7 On | Daily Update
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://www.rspscoding.org/modules/advertisement/banners/archive/977892779.png[/img] [URL=http://www.serenexreborn.com/play.html][FONT=Arial Black]PLAY NOW[/FONT][/URL] -[URL=http://http://uppit.com/dau9n91ox50w/Serenex_Reborn_317.rar] [FONT=Arial Black]DL CLIENT[/FONT][/URL] - [URL=http://www.serenexreborn.com][FONT=Arial Black]FORUMS[/FONT][/URL] -[URL=http://www.serenexreborn.com/vote] [FONT=Arial Black]VOTE[/FONT][/URL]
Alright! Welcome to Serenex Reborn!
We have a lot of more features now and a lot of bug fixes has been done! Server is 24/7 (VPS) and has full forums! Server is 317 and loads 602+ stuff!
[SIZE=4][FONT=arial black]About The Server:[/FONT][/SIZE]
Serenex is pretty fun and friendly server. We got a small community and the community makes it better! Serenex isn't hard server, it's pretty easy and has a lot of features. On Serenex Reborn our Development team listens players suggestions/ideas, so we like to hear things what need to be added or fixed. A great server! We are waiting for you here, all are welcome! What are you waiting for? Start your adventure on Serenex Reborn! #1 RSPS and has a lot of stuff and monsters! You're not going to forget this server! ;) Hopefully we meet ingame! ;)
[IMG]http://pezscape-web.webs.com/mod_icons7.png[/img][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Serenex Staff Team:[/SIZE][/FONT]
Our staff players are Friendly, helpful, loyalty and there's staff players from different time zones. Our staff spots are currently open! 24/7 Staff avaible. If you want to be a part of Staff, you need to be friendly and helpful, and help the server as much as you can! We DO NOT sell staff ranks or put random people as staff, you have to show your skills and earn it!
[IMG]http://www.rs2pl.com/images/gold.gif[/img][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Money Making & Economy:[/SIZE][/FONT]
Server has a good Economy, it's fresh and young, and there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM, Skilling or PKing! Also our items have value, makes everything more fun etc , giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally just get something what you are looking for!
There are a lot of ways to get some money. The best way to get money is killing monsters! Also you can make some money by Skilling and of course, Player killing is also way to get some money, but it's on your own risk. The economy is new and pretty young, so there isn't a much shit yet.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20071020152444/runescape/fi/images/d/da/Achievment_diary.png[/img][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Achievements:[/SIZE][/FONT]
Server has many different custom Achievements too, and more is coming later! There are 4 types of different Achievements, PKing, Skilling, PvM and World. On Serenex you get some rewards when completing an achievement, and they aren't even so hard!
[COLOR=#00FF00][/COLOR][SIZE=4][FONT=arial black]Features:[/FONT][/SIZE][COLOR=#00FF00]
[/COLOR]-Already on the VPS -317 loading 602! -All skills working! (Summoning, Hunter etc too) -Perfect PKing and switching! -Pretty fast EXP and money! -Daily Updates -Warriors Guild -Duel Arena -A lot of other Minigames! -Curses -100% working Clue Scrolls -Skill Task system and Shop -PK Points system -Ton's of bosses -Eco Server -Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Dragon Defender, Hand cannon and a lot of more! -Crystal Chest -Working Summoning! -Fullscreen! -Autocasting! -Donator Benefits -Vote4Reward (Shop also) -Webclient -No LAG -Tested 480 players = 0,87% engine load -Lots of regular updates[COLOR=#00FF00][/COLOR]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]MEDIA:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/chat.png[/img][URL=http://"http://serenexreborn.com"][SIZE=3]FORUMS[/SIZE][/URL] [IMG]http://www.fbriv.org/files/youtube-logo-small1.gif[/img][SIZE=3][URL=http://"http://[urlhttp://www.youtube.com/user/PropanePK[/url]"]YouTube Channel[/URL][/SIZE]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIMbbNSoMvo[/youtube]

Alright! Welcome to Serenex Reborn!

We have a lot of more features now and a lot of bug fixes has been done!
Server is 24/7 (VPS) and has full forums! Server is 317 and loads 602+ stuff!

[SIZE=4][FONT=arial black]About The Server:[/FONT][/SIZE]

Serenex is pretty fun and friendly server.
We got a small community and the community makes it better!
Serenex isn’t hard server, it’s pretty easy and has a lot of features.
On Serenex Reborn our Development team listens players suggestions/ideas, so we like to hear things what need to be added or fixed.
A great server! We are waiting for you here, all are welcome!
What are you waiting for? Start your adventure on Serenex Reborn!
#1 RSPS and has a lot of stuff and monsters! You’re not going to forget this server!
Hopefully we meet ingame!

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Serenex Staff Team:[/SIZE][/FONT]

Our staff players are Friendly, helpful, loyalty and there’s staff players from different time zones.
Our staff spots are currently open!
24/7 Staff avaible.
If you want to be a part of Staff, you need to be friendly and helpful, and help the server as much as you can!
We DO NOT sell staff ranks or put random people as staff, you have to show your skills and earn it!

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Money Making & Economy:[/SIZE][/FONT]

Server has a good Economy, it’s fresh and young, and there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM, Skilling or PKing!
Also our items have value, makes everything more fun etc , giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally just get something what you are looking for!

There are a lot of ways to get some money. The best way to get money is killing monsters!
Also you can make some money by Skilling and of course, Player killing is also way to get some money, but it’s on your own risk.
The economy is new and pretty young, so there isn’t a much shit yet.

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Achievements:[/SIZE][/FONT]

Server has many different custom Achievements too, and more is coming later!
There are 4 types of different Achievements, PKing, Skilling, PvM and World.
On Serenex you get some rewards when completing an achievement, and they aren’t even so hard!

[COLOR=#00FF00][/COLOR][SIZE=4][FONT=arial black]Features:[/FONT][/SIZE][COLOR=#00FF00]

[/COLOR]-Already on the VPS
-317 loading 602!
-All skills working! (Summoning, Hunter etc too)
-Perfect PKing and switching!
-Pretty fast EXP and money!
-Daily Updates
-Warriors Guild
-Duel Arena
-A lot of other Minigames!
-Curses
-100% working Clue Scrolls
-Skill Task system and Shop
-PK Points system
-Ton’s of bosses
-Eco Server
-Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Dragon Defender, Hand cannon and a lot of more!
-Crystal Chest
-Working Summoning!
-Fullscreen!
-Autocasting!
-Donator Benefits
-Vote4Reward (Shop also)
-Webclient
-No LAG
-Tested 480 players = 0,87% engine load
